metadata.dc:author: Martínez Navascués, I
Santos Laraña, M A
metadata.dc:description: This work studies the problems provoked by the closing of a surgical floor of a hospital during the summer months and attempts to evaluate the effects not only in terms of costs but also how it impacts the hospital staff. This article, originally presented as an investigative study, won third prize in the 10th National Nursing Contest, "Ciudad de Sevilla".
metadata.dc:title: Cierre temporal de una unidad de hospitalización quirúrgica.
[An economical and work-related attempt. Temporary closing of a surgical hospital unit].
